General.Name: Suzhou Iron Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Suzhou Iron Technology CO.,LTD. provides solutions for management of medical supplies in China and internationally. Its products include smart pharmacies, smart wards, and smart logistics for medical material intelligent management equipment and software information platforms that provides medical material storage, distribution, management, and services for medical service institutions. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
